# ggsoilprofile

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ggsoilprofile is to make stratigraphy plotting of soil profile easily.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ggsoilprofile from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("i-kiwamu/ggsoilprofile")
```
